testerModal.title: Tester Login

testerModal.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters.

forgotPassword.successMessage: We've sent a password reset link to

usernameSetup.title: Create Your Username

usernameSetup.changeInfo: Your username can be changed later in your profile settings, as long as the new username is available

settings.notAvailableInExpoGoMessage: Push notifications are only available in the standalone app (APK/IPA). Please build the app to use this feature.
settings.disableNotificationsMessage: To disable push notifications, please go to your device settings and turn off notifications for Ferdi.
settings.enableNotificationsMessage: Notifications were previously disabled. Please enable them in your device settings to receive alerts for travel buddy requests and upcoming trips.
settings.notificationsEnabledMessage: You will receive notifications for travel buddy requests, upcoming trips, and more.
settings.notificationsDisabledMessage: You won't receive notifications for travel buddy requests or upcoming trips. You can enable them later in settings.
settings.unableToChange: Unable to change notification settings. Please try again.
settings.unableToOpenPrivacy: Unable to open Privacy Policy. Please try again later.
settings.unableToOpenSupport: Unable to open Support page. Please try again later.
settings.signOutConfirm: Are you sure you want to sign out?
settings.deleteAccountWarning: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone and all your data will be permanently lost.
settings.confirmDeletionMessage: Please type "DELETE" to confirm account deletion.
settings.guestBanner: You're browsing as a guest. Create an account to save trips, budgets, and photos.
settings.tourResetDesc: The dashboard tour will show again on your next visit.

authPrompt.title: Sign Up Required
authPrompt.message: To {{feature}}, you need to create an account or sign in. Your data will be saved securely to your profile.

onboarding.step1Subtitle: This helps us personalize your experience
onboarding.step2Subtitle: What are your top 3 countries you've visited?
onboarding.step3Subtitle: Where do you want to go next?
onboarding.step4Subtitle: Add a bio and share your travel photos

notifications.wantsToBeBuddy: {{name}} wants to be your travel buddy

walkthrough.welcomeDesc: Your travel command center. Plan trips, track stats, and connect with travelers worldwide. Let us show you around!
walkthrough.navBarDesc: Use the bar at the bottom to quickly jump between Dashboard, World Info, Stats, and your Profile.
walkthrough.createTripDesc: Tap the green + button to open the Travel Mapper. Plot your destinations on a map, then save your trip with dates and a budget.
walkthrough.statsDesc: Tap Stats in the bottom bar to see your travel statistics, add countries you've visited, and track your progress.
walkthrough.worldInfoDesc: Tap World Info to explore country rankings, safety scores, affordability, food, and more to help plan your next adventure.
walkthrough.profileDesc: Tap your avatar in the bottom bar to view your profile, edit info, and manage settings.
walkthrough.themeDesc: Tap the sun/moon icon in the top-right of the Dashboard to switch between light and dark themes.
walkthrough.globeDesc: Scroll down on the Dashboard to see your globe and traveler rank. Visit more countries to climb the ranks!

activeTrip.title: Active Trip
activeTrip.noBudget: No budget set for this trip
activeTrip.cannotEditDates: You cannot edit dates on an active trip
